line.text: Delays Posted: 03/04/2015 2:14PM Following an earlier incident at Wakefield-241 St, [2] train service has resumed with residual delays.

text.P: Due to signal problems at 111 St,Â Main St-bound [7] trains are running with delays,
Allow additional travel time.
Due to signal problems at Kings Hwy,Â southbound [F] trains are running with delays.
Allow additional travel time.
Due to signal problems at 9 Av, northbound [D] trains are running with delays.
Allow additional travel time.
Due to FDNY activity at Livonia Av,Â [L] trains are running with delaysin both directions.Â
Allow additional travel time.
text.a: [L] Trains run approximately every 24 minutes between Broadway Junction and Rockaway Pkwy
text.div:
Days, 11 AM to 3:05 PM, Wed to Fri, Mar 4 - 6 • Mon to Fri, Mar 9 - 13
[L] service operates in two sections: 1. Between 8 Av and Broadway Junction 2. Between Broadway Junction and Rockaway Pkwy
• Transfer at Broadway Junction to continue your trip.

text.a: [Q] No trains between 57 St-7 Av and Ditmars Blvd
text.div:
Days, 10 AM to 3 PM, Tue to Fri, Mar 3 - 6
[Q] service operates between Stillwell Av and 57 St-7 Av.
• Take the [N]* instead. Transfer between trains at Times Sq-42 St (across the platform).
*Please review [N] advisories for additional information that may affect your trip.
Alternate travel note: [R] service is also available at 5 Av/59 St and Lexington Av/59 St.
text.a: [N] Coney Island-bound trains skip 30 Av, Broadway, 36 Av and 39 Av
text.div:
Days, 10:15 AM to 3 PM, Tue to Fri, Mar 3 - 6
For service to these stations, take the [N] to Queensboro Plaza and transfer to an Astoria-bound [N].
For service from these stations, take the [N] to Astoria Blvd and transfer to a Coney Island-bound [N].
Note: No [Q] service at these stations during this time.

text.a: [SIR] Boarding Change at Atlantic, Nassau and Richmond Valley Stations
text.div:
Day, 9 AM to 3 PM, Wednesday, Mar 4
• All trains board at the Tottenville-bound platform.

text.P: B44Â and B44-SBS buses are running with delays, due to heavy traffic on Flushing Av from Bedford Av to Nostrand Av in both directions.
Allow additional travel time.
B38 and B38 Ltd are detoured, due to construction at Lafayette Av between Stuyvesant AvÂ and Malcolm X Blvd.
Detour is as follows:
Eastbound: Via Lafayette Av, right on Stuyvesant Av, left on Greene Av, left on Malcolm X Blvd, right on Lafayette Av and regular route.
All corresponding stops will be made along detour route.
Allow additional travel time.
text.a: B24 and B46/B46 LTD buses detoured from the Entrance on Broadway at Washington Plz Terminal
text.div:
Until further notice
Due to construction, buses operate as follows:
Via Broadway Right on Roebling St into Washington Plaza.
text.a: B20 and Q24 - Northbound/Westbound buses detoured from Van Sinderen Av at Broadway clear="left">Junction due to construction - No stops missed
text.div:
Until further notice Show Reroute Details
Via Jamaica Av Into Fulton St Right on Eastern Pkwy Left on Broadway then regular route Reminder: B20 buses do not operate overnight.

text.P: BX10, BX20, BXM1 and BXM2 buses are detoured, due to a snow condition at Henry Hudson Pkwy and 235 St.
Detour is as follows:
BX10, BX20, BXM1, BXM2 Southbound: Via Henry Hudson Pkwy service road, right on 237 St, left on Independence Av, right on Henry Hudson Pkwy service road and then regular route.
All corresponding stops will be made along detour route.
Allow additional travel time.
BX10, BX20, BXM1 and BXM2 buses are detoured, due to a snow condition at Henry Hudson Pkwy and 235 St.
Detour is as follows:
BX10, BX20, BXM1, BXM2 Southbound: Via Henry Hudson Pkwy service road, right on 237 St, left on Independence Av, right on Henry Hudson Pkwy service road and then regular route.
All corresponding stops will be made along detour route.
Allow additional travel time.

line.name: M1 - M116
line.text:
Delays Posted: 03/04/2015 2:18PM
M31 and M57 buses are running with delays in both directions due to heavy traffic on E 57 St between Madison Av and 1 Av.
Allow additional travel time. Delays Posted: 03/04/2015 2:10PM
M1, M2, M3 and M4 buses are running with delays northbound, due to construction on Madison Av and 74 St.
Allow additional travel time. Delays Posted: 03/04/2015 2:10PM
M1, M2, M3, M4 and Q32 buses are running with delays, due to construction on Madison Av between 38 St and 39 St.
Allow additional travel time. Delays Posted: 03/04/2015 2:09PM
M15Â and M15 SBS buses are running with delaysÂ in both directionsÂ due to construction on Madison StÂ and Catherine St.
Allow additional travel time. Service Change Posted: 03/04/2015 12:06PM
M9 and M103 buses are detoured, due to Con Ed work at Park Row.
Detour is as follows:
M9 Southbound: Via Park Row, right on Worth St, left on Lafayette St and regular route.
M103 Southbound: Via Bowery St, right on Worth St, left on Lafayette St and regular route.
All corresponding stops will be made.
Allow additional travel time. Delays Posted: 03/04/2015 12:05PM
M101, M102Â and M103 northbound buses are running with delays, due to construction on 3 Av between 33 StÂ and 35 St.
Allow additional travel time. Delays Posted: 03/04/2015 12:05PM M101, M102 and M103 southbound buses areÂ running with delays,Â due to a road obstruction on Lexington Av from 115 St to 111 St.Allow additional travel time. Â Delays Posted: 03/04/2015 12:04PM
M1, M2, M3 and M4 northbound buses are running with delays, due to snow removal on Madison Av between 94 St and 96 St.
Allow additional travel time. Planned Detour M21 - Eastbound stop on Houston St between Chrystie St and Forsyth St temporarily relocated
Until further notice
Due to construction, please follow directional signage to nearby temporary stop.

text.P: M1, M2, M3, M4 and Q32 buses are running with delays, due to construction on Madison Av between 38 St and 39 St.
Allow additional travel time.
text.a: Q47 and Q49 - Southbound/Westbound buses rerouted from 75 St between 35 Av and 37 Av
text.div:
Until further notice
Due to road work, buses operate as follows, making corresponding stops along the detoured routes. Show Reroute Details
Q47 Southbound Via 73 St Right on 35 Av Left on 65 St Left on Broadway then regular route
Q49 Westbound Via 35 Av Left on 65 St Left on Broadway then regular route
text.a: Q7 and Q41- Eastbound/Northbound stop on Liberty Av at 95 St temporarily closed
text.div:
Until further notice
Due to construction, please use the temporary stop on Cross Bay Blvd at Liberty Av of the Q11 stop.
text.a: Q27 stops on 216 St between 48 Av and 56 Av temporarily closed
text.div:
Until further notice
Due to construction, please use temporary stops on Springfield Blvd in both directions. Show Reroute Details
Northbound Via 56 Av Right on Springfield Blvd Left on 48 Av then regular route
Southbound Via 48 Av Right on Springfield Av Left on 56 Av then regular route
text.a: B20 and Q24 - Northbound/Westbound buses detoured from Van Sinderen Av at Broadway Junction due to construction - No stops missed
text.div:
Until further notice Show Reroute Details
Via Jamaica Av Into Fulton St Right on Eastern Pkwy Left on Broadway then regular route Reminder: B20 buses do not operate overnight.
